00018 /*
00019  * Synchronizer.h
00020  *
00021  *
00022  *  Created on: 07-Jan-2011
00023  *      Author: shravanm
00024  */
00025 
00026 #ifndef SYNCHRONIZER_H_
00027 #define SYNCHRONIZER_H_
00028 
00029 #include "Synchronizer_Helper.h"
00030 
00031 //!The synchronization strategy that
00032 //!uses the Synchronizer_Helper to perform the
00033 //!concrete synchronization steps.
00034 /**
00035  * It provides slots, so to say, for synchronization
00036  * and calls the Synchronizer_Helper to perform its
00037  * duties for that slot.
00038  *
00039  * This greatly reduces the burden on the model writer
00040  *
00041  * So whenever a model needs to be scaled by providing
00042  * a distributed inferencing solution, all the model writer
00043  * has to do is write a Synchronizer_Helper.
00044  *
00045  * This is a default synchronization strategy provided and
00046  * users can implement their own strategy by extending this
00047  *
00048  * The main aim is to run the inferencing locally while
00049  * keeping the model in sync globally through the use of
00050  * this Synchronizer and a Distributed Map
00051  */
00052 class Synchronizer {
00053 public:
00054     Synchronizer(Synchronizer_Helper&);
00055     virtual ~Synchronizer();
00056 
00057     //!The synchronization strategy
00058     void synchronize();
00059 
00060     //!Set that all iterations of the Execution_Strategy
00061     //!have been done
00062     void set_all_iters_done();
00063 
00064     //!Check if the Execution_Strategy has finished
00065     bool is_all_iters_done();
00066 
00067 private:
00068     Synchronizer_Helper& _sync_helper;
00069     bool _all_iters_done;
00070 
00071 };
00072 
00073 #endif /* SYNCHRONIZER_H_ */
